Vital Kerikeri budgeting service closes due to lack of funds https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/vital-kerikeri-budgeting-service-closes-closes-closes-due-to-lack-to-lack-funds/vpfm4gteifgafp5voemkxv2xv2xmq/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/vital-kerikeri-budgeting-service-closes-closes-closes-due-to-lack-to-lack-funds/vpfm4gteifgafp5voemkxv2xv2xmq/ Mike DinsdaleFar North budgeting service lacks funds to keep helping hundreds of families Mon, 31 Mar 2025 17:00:01 +0000 Hundreds of families in and around Kerikeri now face a 64km round trip for budgeting advice after the Northern Community Family Service closed its doors due to lack of funds.
